segments.text: The open cookie jar almost seems to beckon to the boy and girl.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the excitement in their eyes, especially the girl's eager posture.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But it’s a dangerous game they’re playing, reaching for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it could crumble beneath them at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why aren’t they being more careful? It’s infuriating to watch!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, part of me admires their boldness in sneaking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a stark contrast to the woman’s calm demeanor as she polishes that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR
